item.title: On 2020 as researcher
item.description: 올해로 1년 좀 넘게 음성 합성 리서치 업무를 보고 있다. 이번 글에선 19년 9월, 입사부터 20년 말까지 한 활동을 조심히 정리해보려 한다.

item.title: Rewriting a Deep Generative Model
item.description: David Bau et al., 2020, arXiv Keyword: Generative, Adversarial learning Problem: How to manipulate specific rules encoded by a deep generative model.

item.title: Adversarial Latent Autoencoders
item.description: Stanislav Pidhorskyi et al., 2020, arXiv Keyword: Generative, Adversarial learning Problem: AE based approach has poor quality of output distribution.

item.title: Attentive Neural Processes
item.description: Hyunjik kim et al., 2019, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Underfitting of Neural Process Solution: NP + Self-Attention, Cross-Attention Benefits: Improvement of prediction accuracy, training speed, model capability.

item.title: Neural Processes
item.description: Marta Garnelo et al., 2018, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Data inefficiency, hard to train multiple datasets in one.

item.title: Conditional Neural Processes
item.description: Marta Garnelo et al., 2018, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Weakness of knowledge sharing and data inefficiency of classical supervised learning Solution: Stochastic Process + NN Benefits: Data efficient, prior sharing Contribution: Encapsulation of parameterized NN function family.

item.title: Work list
item.description: Skills Languages : Python : C++ [revsic/cpp-obfuscator] ML Framework : Tensorflow [revsic/tf-glow-tts, revsic/tf-diffwave] : PyTorch [revsic/torch-retriever-vc, revsic/torch-diffusion-wavegan] : Jax/Flax [revsic/jax-variational-diffwave]
